title: Iridescent
description: Things are more than they appear...Aly Roberts wasn't expecting much out of small town Airyville, North Carolina. She certainly wasn't expecting to get caught up in a conspiracy involving the town's gated community, Lagniappe. The people of Lagniappe are private, and Aly's new friend, Riley Monroe, is certain that they're hiding something. Lagniappe's secrets are dangerous, and uncovering them may just change their lives forever.
author: Kait Spangler
